name: Mackay
summary: Mackay LGA is part of the Greater Whitsunday region. Mining is a major driver; the region has a significant METS base with an estimated 700+ businesses. Gross regional product is close to $30bn (~6% of Queensland's economy).

opportunityHypotheses.name: Critical minerals (value chain adjacency)
opportunityHypotheses.summary: METS capabilities support servicing critical minerals opportunities; common-user processing infrastructure can be catalytic.

opportunityHypotheses.name: Renewable energy (project pipeline)
opportunityHypotheses.summary: Durable pipeline exists; local capture constrained by awareness, skills gaps, and procurement structure.
